en: Activate VSync only when the framerate is over the refresh rate of the display
fr: Active VSync seulement quand le taux d'images par seconde (IPS) est au dessus du taux de rafraîchissement de l'écran
es: Activar VSync solo cuando la tasa de fotogramas sea superior a la tasa de refresco de la pantalla
cmn_Hans: 仅在帧率超过显示器刷新率时启用垂直同步
cmn_Hant: 僅當幀率超過顯示器的刷新率時啟用垂直同步
de: VSync nur aktivieren, wenn die Bildrate über der Bildwiederholrate des Displays liegt
it: Attiva VSync solo quando il frame rate supera la frequenza di aggiornamento del display
ru: Активировать VSync только при частоте кадров выше частоты обновления дисплея
ko: 프레임 속도가 디스플레이의 주사율을 초과할 때만 버티컬 싱크 활성화
hi: Activate VSync only when the framerate is over the refresh rate of the display
ja: Activate VSync only when the framerate is over the refresh rate of the display
pt: Activate VSync only when the framerate is over the refresh rate of the display

en:
Congrats on finishing the Piece by Piece demo and thank you for playing!

Wishlist our game on Steam and be amongst the first to experience all 8 unique puzzle boxes with 100 levels!
fr:
Félicitations pour avoir terminé la démo de Piece by Piece et merci d'avoir joué !

Ajoutez notre jeu à votre liste de souhaits sur Steam et soyez parmi les premiers à découvrir ses 8 boîtes de puzzle uniques et ses 100 niveaux !
es:
¡Felicidades por terminar la demo de Piece by Piece y gracias por jugar!

¡Agrega nuestro juego a tu lista de deseos en Steam y sé uno de los primeros en experimentar las 8 cajas de rompecabezas únicas con 100 niveles!
cmn_Hans:
恭喜完成《Piece by Piece》演示版，感谢您的游玩！
在Steam上添加我们的游戏愿望单，成为首批体验所有8个独特拼图盒和100个关卡的玩家！
cmn_Hant:
恭喜您完成了《Piece by Piece》演示，感謝您的參與！

在 Steam 上將我們的遊戲加入願望清單，成為首批體驗全部 8 個獨特謎題盒和 100 個關卡的玩家！
de:
Glückwunsch zum Abschluss der Piece by Piece-Demo und vielen Dank fürs Spielen!

Setze unser Spiel auf deine Wunschliste auf Steam und sei einer der Ersten, der alle 8 einzigartigen Puzzleboxen mit 100 Levels erlebt!
it:
Congratulazioni per aver completato la demo di Piece by Piece e grazie per aver giocato!

Aggiungi il nostro gioco alla tua lista dei desideri su Steam e sii tra i primi a provare tutte le 8 scatole puzzle uniche con 100 livelli!
ru:
Поздравляем с прохождением демоверсии Piece by Piece и спасибо за игру!

Добавьте нашу игру в список желаемого в Steam и будьте среди первых, кто испытает все 8 уникальных головоломок со 100 уровнями!
ko:
Piece by Piece 데모를 완료하신 것을 축하드리며, 플레이해주셔서 감사합니다!

Steam에서 우리 게임을 위시리스트에 추가하고, 8개의 독특한 퍼즐 박스와 100개의 레벨을 가장 먼저 경험해보세요!
hi:
Congrats on finishing the Piece by Piece demo and thank you for playing!

Wishlist our game on Steam and be amongst the first to experience all 8 unique puzzle boxes with 100 levels!
ja:
Congrats on finishing the Piece by Piece demo and thank you for playing!

Wishlist our game on Steam and be amongst the first to experience all 8 unique puzzle boxes with 100 levels!
pt:
Parabéns por terminar a demo de Piece by Piece e obrigado por jogar!

Adicione o nosso jogo à sua lista de desejos na Steam e seja um dos primeiros a experimentar todas as 8 caixas de quebra-cabeça únicas com 100 níveis!

fr: Appuyez sur une touche pour poursuivre
de: Drücke eine Taste, um zu überspringen
